plot: A woman worries about her nephew's spiritual education, whose life and his father's are run on their home computer.

"I am the Lord thy God; thou shalt have no other God but me." Ten-year-old Pawel and his father Krzysztof run their lives on their beloved home computer, while Pawel's aunt worries that his spiritual education is being neglected. But Pawel is too busy enjoying life, not least thanks to his father's Christmas present of a pair of ice skates, because the computer has calculated that the frozen lake is safe to skate across...—Michael Brooke <michael@everyman.demon.co.uk>
